name: Downtown payback
description:
You bought some candy in a mafia owned shop, but the transaction was declined... Now they are after your cash, so you have to defend yourself with weapons bought from the very same shop! In this fast-paced top down shooter, try to survive the deepening debt to an ever growing mafia army. Punch bad guys, buy illegal weaponry (with credit) and shoot bees! 

Made by a very confused team of four, the Ludum Dare 48 is our very first game jam.
